SQL_SERVER.STA: create table equalt(id char(20),year char(4),month char(4),day char(4),info char(15),amount int,color char(10),size char(10),inStore char(10),outStore char(10),others char(10),num int,date char(15));

create table inputt(id char(20),year char(4),month char(4),day char(4),info char(15),amount int,color char(10),size char(10),store char(10),inPrice float(8),outPrice float(8),sumPrice float(8),num int,inputORreturn int,date char(15));

create table loset(id char(20),year char(4),month char(4),day char(4),info char(15),amount int,color char(10),size char(10),store char(10),inPrice float(8),loseORgain int,others char(10),num int,date char(15));
create table maint(info char(15),amount int,store char(10),inPrice float(8),outPrice float(8));
create table SearchCable(store char(10),amount int,sumprice char(20),income char(20));

create table sellt(id char(20),year char(4),month char(4),day char(4),info char(15),amount int,color char(10),size char(10),store char(10),outPrice float(8),sellORreturn int,others char(15),num int,date char(15));
create table StreamCache(datetag char(15),id char(20),date char(15),type char(20));
